  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SampleTask
extends Task
    Sample task useful to test the task and task pane usages.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • requestTotalWork

        protected void requestTotalWork()
        Request total work. The implementor, if it knows or can calculate the total work, must call updateProgress(0, totalWork).
